dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause and captured the concept of frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of the CPU → DDR → VCORE chain.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent report accurately captured the key metrics related to VCORE and DDR usage.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and correctly rules out MMDVFS as a cause.
matched_elements: MMDVFS at OPP4 is normal operation

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes are practical but could include more specific historical fixes.
matched_elements: Verify and adjust CM voting strategy
